name: Custom Slot 15 inch Waldorf Inspired Doll March Slot
description:
This listing is for a custom 15 inch Waldorf Doll slot in March

Photos are of other dolls I have made. My dolls are made with very high quality tricot, stuffed with eco-wool, and have stitched on, crocheted wigs for styling versatility. The heads and arms are very sturdy and very neatly stitched with no neck wrinkles. They have small noses and come with a dress, ruffled pants, and crocheted Mary Jane style shoes. Boys come with a shirt, pants, and shoes. They will arrive neatly packed with an Itsystitch birth certificate and a carmine beeswax reblusher. Please allow 2 weeks.

My dolls are lovingly made in my smoke free home. I really love creating these little friends and hope they see years of playtime! 

The above photo shows one of my recent dolls.
